reviews.review: Fun game, thrilling to play as survivor or killer. Be prepared to ignore toxicity from players who think the game needs to be played an exact way to be fun. There are many different play-styles for both survivor and killer, you should play what you enjoy most. You might get hate for it, but its pretty easy to ignore in this game since the only comms are a chatbox post game

Dead by Daylight ein Game mit Potential. Ich hätte echt nicht gedacht, dass mich dieses Spiel so dermaßen fesseln würde und ich muss zugeben dass mich das Spiel süchtig gemacht hat :) Man spürt förmlich die gruselige Atmosphäre besonders wenn man mit einen Headset zockt. In keins meiner Spiele die ich habe, habe ich so viel Zeit investiert wie bereits in Dead by Daylight. Eine klare Spiel empfehlung

Very fun and cool game. There are a lot of unique characters in this game and many iconic horror characters from licensed franchises are featured. You have the choice to be a survivor or the killer in this 1v4 game. There are so many thrilling moments in this game, I would really recommend buying it!
its fun overall, and the charaters have so much personlity behind them. Never a dull moment

el juego está bastante bueno y muy adictivo, al principio no era muy bueno pero con el tiempo le agarré bastante buena onda, tanto el diseño de los killers como de los mapas están bastante chulos, sin embargo con el último dlc lastimosamente no puedo decir lo mismo, este killer no infunde ningún terror y desgraciadamente es demasiado débil, incluso con el buffo reciente no es bueno, pero bueno, es un juego bastante recomendable para sacar el estrés y golpear a todos con tu gran arma, lo digo de esta perspectiva ya que solo juego de killer. aunque puedo decir que la comunidad respecto a los survivors es bastante tóxica. basta con jugar un par de partidas para darte cuenta de como son algunos grupos donde solo se dedican a burlarse del killer y solo se la pasan molestándolo, en fin, no digo que todos sean así pero son la mayoría, en fin, juego bastante entretenido y con contenido para rato. ahora a esperar el dlc de resident evil

Super jeu... Mais un SERVICE de MARDE! Je me fais ban pour sois disant : You are using a cheat in-game. Je joue pas avec les cheats sa scrappe l'expérience au jeu. Ensuite, je contacte le service car je me dis c'est pas normal. Je fais regarder mes fichiers par la compagnie elle-même, rien, on regarde pendant 20 minutes avec la personnes qui s'occupais de moi, on trouve toujours rien. Au final, je me fais dire que je dois réinstaller le jeu car il ne veux plus m'aider. Vraiment décevant comme service. Et je mange mes mots pour rester poli envers la compagnie,,,

So you've heard about the game but you're wondering if this game is worth buying and playing in 2021? I know you're worried that 1. you might not like it or 2. the player base isn't large enough for you to enjoy. Thankfully, you've got nothing to worry about and here's why:

1. The que time for games as of April 24, 2021 is 3 minutes for survivor and 2 minutes for killer.
2. The matchmaking is actually decent, putting you up with people along your tier level. You can tell the higher tiers are filled with better, competent players.
3. It's fun, whether you like the tense survivor action or the fun and exciting killer action.
4. The game has a big roster for both survivor and killer characters respectfully with an even deeper perk system that you can share between your character if your level is high enough.
5. One thing you should know that some of the characters are locked behind a paywall (DLC) but that's okay because it's only like 5 dollars

All in all, do I recommend it? YES
Should you get it in 2021? YES
Are you going to pay more to get the characters? YES

Now come and die  (I'm a killer main)
